channel.title: How to move an interface?
channel.description:
This is probably client sided so if it is let me know and I will post in correct section...
Okay for example I wan't to make it so the fletching interface that is in RS( and the cook one ) is at the top of the screen instead of the bottom. Could somebody tell me the file or what would need to be done in general you don't have to spoonfeed :)

item.title: How to move an interface?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Correct this is client side.

The reason being, it has to do with rendering of interfaces and not just the content.

Read full topic
